root.name: Tekken Hybrid
root.description: OverviewLogo for the upcoming gameTekken Hybrid is a compilation of two games and a movie released by Namco Bandai exclusively for the PlayStation 3. It includes Tekken Tag Tournament HD, which is a remake of Tekken Tag Tournament released in 2000, Tekken Tag Tournament 2: Prologue, which as the name suggests is a prologue to Tekken Tag Tournament 2, and the animated movie Tekken Blood Vengeance 3D (which was also released on Blu-ray and DVD on the same day).Tekken Tag Tournament HDTekken Tag Tournament HDTekken Tag Tournament was a PS2 game released in 2000. Tekken Tag Tournament HD is a re-release of the original game in 720p. Other than every character being unlocked from the beginning, there is little difference from the original game. Notably missing is any online functionality.Tekken Tag Tournament 2: PrologueTekken Tag Tournament 2: Prologue in actionTekken Tag Tournament 2: Prologue is a demo for the upcoming Tekken Tag Tournament 2. It features four playable characters: Devil Jin, Devil Kazuya, Alisa, and Xiaoyu. It has no online capabilities.
